verbs.description: it [V: took] [ARG1: a deadly earthquake] [ARG0: to get taiwan attention] but now it demanding safer buildings property owners in taiwan have sidestepped quake safety over the decades despite numerous warnings and disasters but after a deadly quake feb 6 the government said it would require reviews of more than 34 000 existing structures and for the first time make their owners ensure safety hualien city bes engineering central government shen taiwan interior minister earthquake
